title: 新人报道，请问mcbbs赚取金粒的方法有哪些呢

replies.author: Alkohol_
replies.txt_content: 只知道每天回复5次的任务

replies.author: FloatingBlocks
replies.txt_content:
可以去举报水贴
比如【展示&共享】板块

replies.author: MisakaFish
replies.txt_content: 回复帖子  去举报  去问答版回答问题  什么的

replies.author: HolographicHat
replies.txt_content: 回帖，发帖，做任务，举报或主题被他人加分
每天做任务 水水帖 XD

replies.author: 冰の风铃草
replies.txt_content: 多做任务,勤灌...噗我什么都没说!

replies.author: NONGFUSPRLNGL
replies.txt_content: 做任务，签到

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 问答版回答问题，要好好回答，别人给你最佳了才算

replies.author: Hz_bingc
replies.txt_content: 吧规里都有哦

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
其实我也不是很清楚
目前最为轻便的方法估计就是当管理员随意调配数据了吧

replies.author: z327121579
replies.txt_content: 发帖 每日任务 悬赏

replies.author: jialun520
replies.txt_content: 比如像现在 我点一下举报 就有钱啦awa

replies.author: 会微笑的猫
replies.txt_content: 每日签到，每日任务

replies.author: cuizi
replies.txt_content: 任务回复

replies.author: ei_bai
replies.txt_content: 加油ヾ(?°?°?)??   我也在赚金粒~~~

replies.author: 小佬虎
replies.txt_content: 回复贴子 像我这样

replies.author: 听风有語
replies.txt_content: 做任务是最重要的 还有就是回复发帖子等等

replies.author: lxf0508
replies.txt_content: 任务

replies.author: 其点
replies.txt_content: 领取任务做任务金粒就会慢慢涨了

replies.author: xianren66
replies.txt_content: 最棒的就是举报水贴了

replies.author: 樱千落妖精
replies.txt_content: 自动签到，稳赚不赔（仅适合六级及以上等级用户）

replies.author: Jannik
replies.txt_content: 认真回（氵）复（贴），举报，每日任务

replies.author: 社会我胖虎
replies.txt_content: 每日签到 回帖 和任务

replies.author: hj2629638
replies.txt_content: 做任务,6级签到

replies.author: myrymy
replies.txt_content: 做任务，回答问题，貌似没了

replies.author: 酒秀人
replies.txt_content: 每日任务

replies.author: 萌主丁白海
replies.txt_content: 回复别人就能得
做任务，签到咯

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content: 任务,"水"贴
